name: RQG_DB_MAIN
description: This table contains information about the Requisition Grouper (RQG) Source: ID Number, Name, Sex, Gender Identity, Sex Assigned at Birth, DOB or Age, SSN, Species, Ethnic Group, City, State, Zip Code, County, Country, House Number, District, Status, and Email. This table also contains the gamete donor ID, date of donation, age of donation, donation bank name, and the donor's relationship with the patient for gamete donor RQG records.

columns.name: RQG_GROUPER_ID
columns.description: This is the primary key for RQG tables and refers to the ID number of the source Requisition Grouper.

columns.name: RQG_GROUPER_NAME
columns.description: This is the name of the Requisition Grouper source.

columns.name: RQG_RECORD_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the record status (hidden, soft-deleted, etc...) of the Requisition Grouper source. This category list is stored in ECT 1000.

columns.name: RQG_DOB_DT
columns.description: This is the Date of Birth of the Requisition Grouper source.

columns.name: RQG_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description: This is the sex of the Requisition Grouper source. This category list is stored in EPT 130.

columns.name: RQG_SSN
columns.description: This is the SSN of the Requisition Grouper source.

columns.name: RQG_AGE_UNITS_C_NAME
columns.description: Units for the age of the requisition grouper

columns.name: RQG_CITY
columns.description: The city of the requisition grouper's address.

columns.name: RQG_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: The state category number of the requisition grouper's address.

columns.name: RQG_ZIP
columns.description: The ZIP code of the requisition grouper's address.

columns.name: RQG_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description: The county category number of the requisition grouper's address.

columns.name: RQG_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description: The country category number of the requisition grouper's address.

columns.name: RQG_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: The house number of the requisition grouper's address.

columns.name: RQG_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description: The district category number of the requisition grouper's address.

columns.name: ETHNIC_GROUP_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the ethnic group a patient belongs to.

columns.name: RQG_BIRTH_TM
columns.description: The date and time of birth of the Requisition Grouper source.

columns.name: GENDER_IDENTITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The gender identity category ID for the patient.

columns.name: SEX_ASGN_AT_BIRTH_C_NAME
columns.description: The sex assigned at birth category ID for the patient.

columns.name: RQG_AGE_NUM
columns.description: The age of the requisition grouper, including decimal values when applicable.
